verses.verse: But in the latter <S%H319><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> it shall come to pass <S%H2022><s%>, that the mountain of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> shall be established <S%H3559><s%> on the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, and it shall be exalted <S%H5375><s%> above the hills <S%H1389><s%>; and peoples <S%H5971><s%> shall flow unto it <S%H5102><s%>.

And many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> shall go <S%H1980><s%> and say <S%H559><s%>, Come <S%H3212><s%> ye <S%H5927><s%>, and let us go up to the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and to the house <S%H1004><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>; and he will teach <S%H3384><s%> us of his ways <S%H1870><s%>, and we will walk <S%H3212><s%> in his paths <S%H734><s%>. For out of Zion <S%H6726><s%> shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> the law <S%H8451><s%>, and the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> from Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>;

and he will judge <S%H8199><s%> between many <S%H7227><s%> peoples <S%H5971><s%>, and will decide <S%H3198><s%> concerning strong <S%H6099><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> afar off <S%H7350><s%>: and they shall beat <S%H3807><s%> their swords <S%H2719><s%> into plowshares <S%H855><s%>, and their spears <S%H2595><s%> into pruning-hooks <S%H4211><s%>; nation <S%H1471><s%> shall not lift up <S%H5375><s%> sword <S%H2719><s%> against nation <S%H1471><s%>, neither shall they learn <S%H3925><s%> war any more <S%H4421><s%>.

But they shall sit <S%H3427><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> under his vine <S%H1612><s%> and under his fig-tree <S%H8384><s%>; and none shall make them afraid <S%H2729><s%>: for the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> hath spoken it <S%H1696><s%>.

For all the peoples <S%H5971><s%> walk <S%H3212><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of his god <S%H430><s%>; and we will walk <S%H3212><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever <S%H5703><s%>.

In that day <S%H3117><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, will I assemble <S%H622><s%> that which is lame <S%H6760><s%>, and I will gather <S%H6908><s%> that which is driven away <S%H5080><s%>, and that which I have afflicted <S%H7489><s%>;

and I will make <S%H7760><s%> that which was lame <S%H6760><s%> a remnant <S%H7611><s%>, and that which was cast far off <S%H1972><s%> a strong <S%H6099><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%>: and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will reign <S%H4427><s%> over them in mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%> from henceforth even for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>.

And thou <S%H4026><s%>, O tower of the flock <S%H5739><s%>, the hill <S%H6076><s%> of the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%>, unto thee shall it come <S%H857><s%>, yea <S%H7223><s%>, the former dominion <S%H4475><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%>, the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> of the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

Now why dost thou cry <S%H7321><s%> out aloud <S%H7452><s%>? Is there no king <S%H4428><s%> in thee <S%H3289><s%>, is thy counsellor perished <S%H6><s%>, that pangs <S%H2427><s%> have taken <S%H2388><s%> hold of thee as of a woman in travail <S%H3205><s%>?

Be in pain <S%H2342><s%>, and labor to bring forth <S%H1518><s%>, O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%>, like a woman in travail <S%H3205><s%>; for now shalt thou go forth <S%H3318><s%> out <S%H3318><s%> of the city <S%H7151><s%>, and shalt dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%>, and shalt come even unto Babylon <S%H894><s%>: there shalt thou be rescued <S%H5337><s%>; there will Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> redeem <S%H1350><s%> thee from the hand <S%H3709><s%> of thine enemies <S%H341><s%>.

And now many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> are assembled <S%H622><s%> against thee <S%H559><s%>, that say, Let her be defiled <S%H2610><s%>, and let our eye <S%H5869><s%> see <S%H2372><s%> our desire upon Zion <S%H6726><s%>.

But they know <S%H3045><s%> not the thoughts <S%H4284><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, neither understand <S%H995><s%> they his counsel <S%H6098><s%>; for he hath gathered <S%H6908><s%> them as the sheaves <S%H5995><s%> to the threshing-floor <S%H1637><s%>.

Arise <S%H6965><s%> and thresh <S%H1758><s%>, O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%>; for I will make <S%H7760><s%> thy horn <S%H7161><s%> iron <S%H1270><s%>, and I will make <S%H7760><s%> thy hoofs <S%H6541><s%> brass <S%H5154><s%>; and thou shalt beat in pieces <S%H1854><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> peoples <S%H5971><s%>: and I will devote <S%H2763><s%> their gain <S%H1215><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and their substance <S%H2428><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of the whole earth <S%H776><s%>.
